channel.title: Compiling Error
channel.description:
javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
I am trying to compile my RSPS that I have just made. I go into client.java and change the IP to mine, and i go back, and realize theres no compile option!
So I make one, and ik its connected to my correct java version, plus I have it connected to my CLASSPATH, and my Path inside the properties of my computer.
Can you help me please guys?

item.title: Compiling Error
item.dc:creator: @obabygirl obabygirl
item.description:
@obabygirl wrote:

javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

I am trying to compile my RSPS that I have just made. I go into client.java and change the IP to mine, and i go back, and realize theres no compile option!

So I make one, and ik its connected to my correct java version, plus I have it connected to my CLASSPATH, and my Path inside the properties of my computer.

Can you help me please guys?
